nodes.text: Atris was an individual who served as Commander and First Officer of the Dynath Miners during the Galactic Civil War. During the Battle of Tansarii Point Station, Atris's starship, the G1-M4-C Dunelizard fighter Draosa Star, was attacked by Black Sun starfighters in the Bright Jewel Ribbon. The pilot managed to successfully destroy multiple enemy ships before being overwhelmed. Atris was eventually rescued by Car'das starfighters dispatched by Aleas Rans'ery.
